changeSet.createView: SELECT w.name AS workspace, base_table.id, p.name AS service, sc.name AS status_code, base_table.sequence_number, mp.name AS parent, mps.name AS parent_status_to_set, base_table.set_if_active_siblings, base_table.notes, up.name AS updated_by, base_table.version FROM product_parent_sequencing_authorization base_table JOIN product p ON base_table.service = p.id JOIN status_code sc ON base_table.status_code = sc.id LEFT JOIN product mp ON base_table.parent = mp.id LEFT JOIN status_code mps ON base_table.parent_status_to_set = mps.id JOIN agency up ON base_table.updated_by = up.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.workspace_authorization wa ON base_table.workspace = wa.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.product w ON wa.defining_product = w.id
